properties.description: Orders and Details are in same colletion but each has own document type attribute.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT   [dbo].[Orders].orderID , 
OrderDate, 
FirstName, 
LastName, 
Address,
City, 
State, 
PostalCode, 
Country, 
Phone, 
SMSOptin, 
SMSStatus, 
Orders.Email, 
ReceiptUrl,
Total, 
PaymentTransactionId,
HasBeenShipped,
    (
        SELECT OrderDetailId,
ProductId,
Quantity,
UnitPrice 
        FROM [dbo].[OrderDetails]  
		where [dbo].[Orders].orderid = [dbo].[OrderDetails].orderid
        FOR JSON auto
    ) AS [OrderDetails]
FROM [dbo].[Orders]
